channel.title: Comments on: RS-232 Level Converter
channel.description: Intermediate in flow properties between solids and liquids; highly viscous.

item.title: By: dan
item.dc:creator: dan
item.description:
hello
i would like to know the reason why max233 with rs232 is preferred over max232 with rs232

hello

i would like to know the reason why max233 with rs232 is preferred over max232 with rs232
